item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club - New England Area!

What: Beverly - You need a Wintervention!

When: Sunday, November 17, 2010 7:00 PM (film), 5:00pm dinner beforehand

Where: Endicott College Auditorium
376 Hale Street
Beverly, MA, 01915

Wedelns of the North Shore and Friends - you need a Wintervention

Get ready for Warren Miller's 61st film: Wintervention!

Do you have a skiing or snowboarding problem? Do you always take "just one more" run? If you answered “yes” to either of these, it may be time for a Wintervention. Narrated by skiing icon Jonny Moseley, Warren Miller’s Wintervention is the definitive solution for the snow-obsessed. Wintervention takes riders like Chris Davenport, Jonny Moseley and Lindsey Vonn on a global tour of Alaska, Norway, Canada, Antarctica and beyond… delivering a successful Wintervention for all of us in need. Warren Miller films attract a cult-like following and mark the official start of winter for sports enthusiasts everywhere. Warren Miller premieres are an experience, a party and a phenomenon not to be missed

We'll meet for drinks and a bite to eat beforehand at 5:00pm at Acapulco's at the Cummings Center in Beverly and then see the film afterwards at Endicott College Auditorium.

Acapulcos
900 Cummings Ctr # 101T
Beverly, MA 01915-6196
(978) 232-0100

Showtimes Sunday, November 7, 2010 - 7:00pm

Ticket Information
(Apparently EMS in Peabody knows nothing of being a ticket source, so I'd skip them as an option to purchase tickets.)
Leighton O'Connor did a little checking for us and tickets are supposed to be $19 at Endicott's box office.
TICKETMASTER online, and the Endicott College box office night of show only. (Ticket was $28 with shipping and took 2-3 days to arrive-so don't bother with Ticketmaster this if you haven't already got a ticket.)

Please order your ticket before you RSVP - Yes

See you there!

Heather Cowen
item.name: Wintervention-Beverly, MA Warren Miller Movie
